summary: After spending an enjoyable summer with a guy in the archipelago, a girl comes to Helsinki and goes through a meandering search trying to find him again.
cast: Raili Metsä|Yrjö Tähtelä|Unto Salminen|Herman Schaibel|Soili Poutiainen|Juhani Juustinen|Kaarlo Juurela|Maija-Liisa Rönnberg|Liisa Pakarinen|Josef Kersch|Ruben Fiedler|Arvo Summanen|Paki Peltonen|Harri Kahramo|Juhani Harri|Marja Lindqvist|Outi Pennanen|Annika Ruutsalo|Helena Ruutsalo|Juha Ruutsalo
keywords: finnish new wave|lumberyard|promise|seeking love|summer of love
title: Tuulinen päivä
